Get-SafeReportFilename

Get-SafeReportFilename

external help file: checkit-core-help.xml Module Name: checkit-core online version: schema: 2.0.0 ‚Äî

Get-SafeReportFilename

SYNOPSIS

Returns a safe filename for a report export.

SYNTAX

Get-SafeReportFilename [-Function] [-ReportName] [-Groups] <String[]> [[-Timestamp] ] [-ProgressAction ] []

DESCRIPTION

EXAMPLES

Example 1

PS C:>
